name: df-ga
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5, setvar s6
body: |- wceq(cga, cmpo(s0, s1, cgrp, universe, csb(s2, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), crab(s3, co(cv(s1), cmap, cxp(cv(s2), cv(s1))), wral(s4, cv(s1), wa(wceq(co(cfv(c0g, cv(s0)), cv(s3), cv(s4)), cv(s4)), wral(s5, cv(s2), wral(s6, cv(s2), wceq(co(co(cv(s5), cfv(cplusg, cv(s0)), cv(s6)), cv(s3), cv(s4)), co(cv(s5), cv(s3), co(cv(s6), cv(s3), cv(s4))))))))))))
comment: Define the class of all group actions. A group ` G ` acts on a set ` S ` if a permutation on ` S ` is associated with every element of ` G ` in such a way that the identity permutation on ` S ` is associated with the neutral element of ` G ` , and the composition of the permutations associated with two elements of ` G ` is identical with the permutation associated with the composition of these two elements (in the same order) in the group ` G ` . (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 10-Aug-2009.)
